thread.title: The cast of 'Power Rangers' in real life
thread.title_full: The cast of 'Power Rangers' in real life - Business Insider

author: Jacob Shamsian
title: The cast of 'Power Rangers' in real life
text:
Actor Dacre Montgomery plays Jason Scott, also known as the Red Ranger, in the new "Power Rangers" movie. Emma McIntyre/Getty Images; Lionsgate
The new "Power Rangers" movie looks wild.
The adaptation takes the zany plot of the beloved children's show — about a bunch of teenagers who get superpowers and have to fight evil alien monsters — and gives it a huge budget. In addition to five relatively unknown actors as the Power Rangers, clad in shiny, candy-colored costumes , the movie features Bryan Cranston and Elizabeth Banks as intergalactic, super-powered aliens who are millions of years old.
Scroll through to see what the actors look like in real life compared to what they look like in the movie.
View As: One Page Slides Bryan Cranston plays Zordon, a god-like being who has been around for millions of years and mentors the Power Rangers. He himself was the original Red Ranger. Lionsgate Cranston, most famous for playing Walter White in "Breaking Bad," has six Emmys and an Oscar nomination. Matt Winkelmeyer/Getty Images for TNT Source: IMDb
Dacre Montgomery plays Jason Scott, the present-day Red Ranger, who is the leader of the Power Rangers. Lionsgate The 22-year-old will be in the second season of "Stranger Things." Emma McIntyre/Getty Images Source: Variety
Naomi Scott plays Kimberly Hart. In the TV show, Hart had the longest tenure as the Pink Ranger. Lionsgate The 23-year-old British actress is best known for starring in the shows "Terra Nova" and "Life Bites." Emma McIntyre/Getty Images Source: IMDb
The Yellow Ranger in the movie has gotten some buzz for arguably being the first openly gay superhero in a major movie. Lionsgate Movies/YouTube Source: Indiewire
She's played by Becky G, a talented 20-year-old singer, songwriter, and model who's made several songs with Pitbull. Christopher Polk/Getty Images She's also appeared in movies like "The Smurfs 2" and "Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising" as well as the show "Empire."
Source: IMDb
RJ Cyler plays the Blue Ranger, Billy Cranston. No relation to Bryan. Lionsgate Movies/YouTube He's best known for starring in the 2015 Sundance hit "Me and Earl and the Dying Girl" and for a few episodes of the caustic HBO satire "Vice Principals." Emma McIntyre/Getty Images Source: IMDb
Ludi Lin plays Zack Taylor, the original Black Ranger. Lionsgate The Beijing-based actor had small roles in "Marco Polo" and in the 2015 movie "Monster Hunt," which was at one point the highest-grossing movie in the history of China's box office. Christopher Polk/Getty Images Source: Fortune
Rita Repulsa is a 65-million-year-old evil alien who used to be the Green Power Ranger but now wants to destroy Earth with a monster named Goldar. Lionsgate She's played by Elizabeth Banks, who's been acclaimed for a wide range of comedic and dramatic roles and who directed "Pitch Perfect 2." Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images Source: IMDb
Alpha 5 is Zordon's robot assistant, who can transform into different forms. Lionsgate Bill Hader provides the voice for Alpha 5. He's known for his work in "Saturday Night Live," "Documentary Now!," and dozens of comedy movies. He also voices animated characters on "South Park." Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images Source: IMDb
